question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct about the Tobacco crop?
  1. Tobacco is an important cash crop which can be grown in tropical as well as mid-latitude areas.
  2. Tobacco cultivation is a labour intensive activity.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Tobacco is an important cash crop in a number of regions and it can be grown in tropical as well as mid-latitude areas. This plant is highly responsive to climatic and soil conditions. Tobacco cultivation is a labour intensive activity. A large number of workers are needed to plant saplings and then to tend to the crop. Tobacco is grown in different parts of the world on small as well as large farms.
